title: 'As if the world is breaking': Tampines residents woken up by traffic noise in the wee hours
desc: SINGAPORE – Like many of his neighbours, Tampines resident Abdul Razak Subahan is often jolted awake in the middle of the night by loud cars and motorcycles revving their engines along the roads that his flat overlooks.He said this happens almost every day in the wee hours.“It can be very painful... When you’re sleeping, it triggers you to wake up....

title: Two-year ban imposed on rockpool harvesting north of Auckland
desc: The temporary closure — requested by Ngāti Manuhiri and backed by a rāhui — will prohibit taking most marine life from east coast rockpools from next month.

title: Daughter whose dad fought detainment as she battled cancer dies
desc: Ofelia Torres' story came to public attention after the teen's father was detained at a Home Depot in Niles.

title: TB outbreak: Malaysia records 503 new cases
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: A total of 503 new tuberculosis (TB) cases were reported nationwide during the fifth epidemiological week.

title: Does Fiverr (FVRR) Still Justify Its Valuation Discount Amid Rising EPS Expectations and AI Hopes?
desc: Fiverr International recently saw a sharp shift in investor attention ahead of its now-past 18 February 2026 earnings release, with analysts expecting earnings per share to rise 18.75% year-on-year and maintaining a Hold (Zacks Rank #3) rating amid a valuation discount to the industry average. This mix of cautious analyst sentiment and higher earnings expectations has intensified interest in whether Fiverr’s evolving marketplace model and AI-driven services can support the profit trajectory...

title: Young Africans embark on journey to own CAF approved stadium
desc: Tanzania Premier League champions Young Africans have launched a plan to built a stadium to host their matches, in the league, and the international stage.

title: Actress Reveals Terrifying Photos of Symptoms While Recovering From Surgery
